segments.text: I can't help but smile a little at the children's antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so determined to get those cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really reaching for them, despite the wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His concentration is admirable, almost like a tiny bandit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's expectant gaze is priceless, truly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly an eager accomplice in this secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a coordinated effort between them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are taking advantage of the woman's complete preoccupation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've tried this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of them getting caught makes me a little nervous, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're risking a scolding, and potentially a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But for now, they seem to be focused on their sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they manage to grab a few without incident.
segments.speaker: PAR
